description.en: An Agito Cadet at Akademeia with a polite tone and gentle disposition. One of the smartest even in Class Zero、 his intellect is recognized by his peers and he leverages that intelligence to support his comrades. Unfortunately、 he is known to ramble without pause to the vexation of those around him.
description.jp:
魔導院ペリシティリウム朱雀・０組に
所属するアギト候補生。丁寧な口調と
穏やかな物腰で接するスマートな青年。
０組でも１，２を争うほどの知性派で
自他共に認める知恵袋として仲間たちを
サポートする。一方 隙あらば知識を
披露したがる上に長話なのが玉にキズ。

jp.text: 私たちは今\n大きな問題に直面しています
勝算がないとわかっていて立ち向かうなんて\n愚かなことはありえませんよ
いえいえ まだ話は終わってません
考えるのは 自由ですよ
私も心で弾いてますから

gl.text: We have larger issues at stake right now.
We mustn't act rashly. It would be the pinnacle of foolishness to engage an enemy against whom we were almost certain to lose.
Excuse me! Our conversation is not over.
But we're free to think about it.
For I also play from my heart.

name.jp: コールアビリティ_トレイ

rank_up_desc.jp:
「アローダイナマイト【C】」使用時
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・ターゲット以外にも50％分のHPダメージ
・特殊効果「ダイナマイト」付与が敵全体化

name.jp: LDコールアビリティ_トレイ

rank_up_desc.jp:
「ヒット＆シールド【C】」使用時
・3HIT遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃を2回行うが
　3HIT遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃を3回行う
　に変化し合計BRV威力極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・弱体効果「ファイアシールド」の2ACTION期間延長

desc.en:
2-HIT AoE ranged BRV attack + AoE HP attack
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Grants [Impeccable Shot] for 3 turns
Grants [Arrow Shower] for 1 turn

If unused, becomes
[Raining Arrows (Charge 1)] on the next turn

While [Arrow Shower] is active
• Triggers [Arrow Shower] for any action taken
　∟ AoE ranged BRV attack + AoE HP attack
　∟ Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
　∟ Raises ally BRV based on HP damage dealt
　∟ Cannot initiate a chase sequence
　∟ Consumes 1 turn of [Arrow Shower]

[Impeccable Shot]
• Raises Max BRV and Attack

[Arrow Shower]
• Triggers [Arrow Shower] after any action taken
desc.gl:
2-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Self: 3 turns Accurate Arrow; 1 turn special effect Arrow Shower
Becomes Raining Arrows (Charge 1) on next turn when not used
While special effect Arrow Shower active:
 • Every turn reduces special effect Arrow Shower count by 1, triggers Arrow Shower (group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack; deals proportionate HP damage to each target; grants allies BRV based on HP damage dealt; no Knock Back)
desc.jp:
2HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
与えるHPダメージは分配
自身に3ACTION「正確な一矢」
1ACTION特殊効果「降り注ぐ矢」付与
未使用の次の行動時
「アローシャワー（チャージ1）」に変化
特殊効果「降り注ぐ矢」付与中
敵味方の行動順が経過する度に1ACTION減少し 以下の「降り注ぐ矢」が発動
バーストモード中は発動せず バーストモード終了後に1回のみ発動
全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
与えるHPダメージは分配
与えたHPダメージに依存した量のBRVを
自身以外の味方全員に加算
この攻撃で吹きとばしは発生しない

name.jp: アローシャワーエクステンド

desc.en:
When using [Raining Arrows], [Raining Arrows (Charge 1)]
• Increases number of BRV hits by 2
• Greatly raises total BRV potency
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV

If [Raining Arrows (Charge 1)] wasn't used, becomes
[Raining Arrows (Charge 2)] on the next turn
• BRV attack hit count becomes 6
• Moderately raises total BRV potency
• Slightly raises Max BRV overflow limit for stolen BRV
• Extends duration of [Arrow Shower] by 1 turn
• Slightly raises BRV gain based on HP damage dealt
• Reverts to [Raining Arrows] after use

When triggering [Arrow Shower]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 2
• Moderately raises total BRV potency
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
desc.gl:
Raining Arrows use +2

When using Raining Arrows, Raining Arrows (Charge 1):
 • BRV attack hit count to target increased by 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

On next turn when Raining Arrows (Charge 1) not used:
 • Becomes Raining Arrows (Charge 2) (BRV attack hit count becomes 6; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; slightly increased limit for stolen BRV that may exceed MAX BRV; special effect Arrow Shower duration +1; slight boost to BRV granted based on HP damage dealt to self; returns to Raining Arrows after use)

When Arrow Shower triggers:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
desc.jp:
「アローシャワー」の使用回数＋2

「アローシャワー」「アローシャワー（チャージ1）」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数を2HIT追加し
　合計BRV威力も大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分

「アローシャワー（チャージ1）」未使用の次の行動時
以下の「アローシャワー（チャージ2）」に変化
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が6HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も中アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する上限小アップ
・特殊効果「降り注ぐ矢」の1ACTION延長
・自身への与えたHPダメージ依存のBRV加算量小アップ
・使用後 「アローシャワー」に戻る

「降り注ぐ矢」発動時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も中アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分

short_desc.jp: アローシャワーエクステンド：「アローシャワー」の性能アップ

name.jp: アローダイナマイトエクステンド

desc.en:
When using [Dynamite Arrow], [Dynamite Arrow (Charge 1)] 
• Increases number of BRV hits by 2
• Tremendously raises total BRV potency
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV

If [Dynamite Arrow (Charge 1)] wasn't used, becomes
[Dynamite Arrow (Charge 2)] on the next turn
• Tremendously raises BRV potency
• Slightly raises the Max BRV overflow limit for stolen BRV
• Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
• Slightly raises BRV gain based on HP damage dealt
• Reverts to [Dynamite Arrow] after use

When triggering [Dynamite]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 4
• Greatly raises total BRV potency
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV

While [Impeccable Shot] is active
• Turns [BRV Attack] to [BRV Attack+]
　∟ Raises party BRV based on Attack
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Slightly raises total BRV potency
desc.gl:
Dynamite Arrow use +2

When using Dynamite Arrow, Dynamite Arrow (Charge 1):
 • BRV attack hit count to target increased by 2; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

On next turn when Dynamite Arrow (Charge 1) not used:
 • Becomes Dynamite Arrow (Charge 2) (tremendous BRV damage boost; slightly increased limit for stolen BRV that may exceed MAX BRV; deals 50% HP damage to non-targets; returns to Dynamite Arrow after use)

When Dynamite triggers:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

While Accurate Arrow active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (grants party BRV based on own ATK; BRV attack hit count becomes 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage)

desc.gl:
Raining Arrows use +2

When using Raining Arrows, Raining Arrows (Charge 1):
 • BRV attack hit count to target increased by 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

On next turn when Raining Arrows (Charge 1) not used:
 • Becomes Raining Arrows (Charge 2) (BRV attack hit count becomes 6; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; slightly increased limit for stolen BRV that may exceed MAX BRV; special effect Arrow Shower duration +1; slight boost to BRV granted based on HP damage dealt to self; returns to Raining Arrows after use)

When Arrow Shower triggers:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

desc.en:
When using [Grand Delta] 
• Becomes 5-HIT AoE ranged BRV attack + AoE HP attack delivered twice
• Tremendously raises total BRV potency

[HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+]
　∟ 2-HIT ranged BRV + HP attack
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV

[HP Attack (Charge 1)] becomes [HP Attack+ (Charge 1)]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Slightly raises total BRV potency
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV

If [HP Attack+ (Charge 1)] wasn't used, becomes [HP Attack+ (Charge 2)] on next turn
　∟ Slightly raises BRV gain based on Max BRV
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 3
　∟ Moderately raises total BRV potency
　∟ Slightly raises Max BRV overflow limit for stolen BRV
　∟ Reverts back to [HP Attack+] after use
desc.gl:
When using Grand Delta:
 • 5-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack becomes 5-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 2 times; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage

 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (2-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)

 • HP Attack (Charge 1) becomes HP Attack+ (Charge 1) (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; returns to HP Attack+ after use)

 • HP Attack+ (Charge 1) becomes HP Attack+ (Charge 2) on next turn when not used (slight boost to BRV granted based on own MAX BRV; BRV attack hit count becomes 3; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; slightly increased limit for stolen BRV that may exceed MAX BRV; returns to HP Attack+ after use)

　に変化し 合計BRV威力も極大アップ

　-2HIT遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃に変化
　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分

・「HP攻撃（チャージ1）」が以下の「HP攻撃＋（チャージ1）」に変化
　-BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　　合計BRV威力も小アップ
　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
　-使用後 「HP攻撃＋」に戻る

・「HP攻撃＋（チャージ1）」未使用の次の行動時

　-自身への自身の最大BRVに依存したBRV加算量小アップ
